name: Nights of the Blue-Flamed Wolf
description:
You're called back to the city after the night creature apocalypse, where people suddenly turned into black creatures of the night, able to find any surviving humans and kill them.

The nostalgic feeling doesn't stop as you reach a building that seems suitable for a hideout. It's time to see where this feeling takes you.

A (crappy) 2D beat em' up, featuring a 1-minute day-night cycle.

You lose when your hideout is breached, or when you die. You're life is essentially over when that happens. But do keep in mind that you are human, so you cannot take that many hits. (And I totally did not do that because I'm bad at programming enemy AI.)

There are 3 endings by the way.

Keys:

Use WASD or Arrow keys to move

Attack: H or Z

Strong Attack: J or X

Stop Fighting Stance: K or C

Interact: L or V

Made originally for a game jam, but I was an idiot and uploaded it a day late. So it's here now.
